name: Diceventure
description:
A short 3D platformer (the first one I've ever done) about a rolling dice on a giant board game.

/!\  CONTROLS 

-WASD to move 
-Space bar to stomp

what happens after you stomp the ground depends on the result of the roll,

Try to time your stomps according to the dice.

Speedrun world record :   2:57 by  éclair foudroyant

Feel free to comment your best time below!

With the participation of OKman65 and Lyta
